meanings.definition: The study of the chemical composition and processes of cells using immunological techniques.
meanings.sent1: Immunocytochemistries help scientists understand how cells work at a chemical level.
meanings.sent2: Researchers used immunocytochemistries to analyze the components of different cells.
meanings.sent3: The professor made learning about immunocytochemistries fun by using colorful diagrams.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, immunocytochemistries act as detectives revealing hidden chemical secrets.
meanings.sent5: The book on immunocytochemistries painted a vivid picture of cellular chemistry.

meanings.definition: The techniques used in immunocytochemistry to study the chemical composition of cells.
meanings.sent1: Scientists developed new immunocytochemistries to better examine cell structures.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician mastered various immunocytochemistries for precise cell analysis.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the immunocytochemistries unexpectedly created a colorful reaction.
meanings.sent4: The tools of immunocytochemistries are like keys unlocking the mysteries of cell chemistry.
meanings.sent5: Her presentation on immunocytochemistries left a lasting impression on the audience.
